channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No. 24 Kansas Will Play Vegas Tournament Without Star Freshman Darryn Peterson
item.description: No. 24 Kansas will be without star freshman Darryn Peterson for a tournament in Las Vegas next week

item.title: Julian Edelman on Shedeur Sanders, Chiefs, Patriots & Drake Maye | FULL INTERVIEW | The Herd
item.description: Julian Edelman joins Colin Cowherd to discuss Shedeur Sanders’ first start in the NFL, the Kansas City Chiefs, and Drake Maye’s MVP-like season with t...

item.title: College Football Week 13 Picks, Preview: What To Expect In Rutgers-OSU, More
item.description: Who will win the major USC-Oregon matchup? What should we expect in Rutgers-Ohio State? Joel Klatt picks and previews Week 13.

item.title: Cowboys WR George Pickens on Time With Steelers: 'I Made Some Mistakes'
item.description: Dallas Cowboys wide receiver George Pickens opened up about regrets that he has regarding his time with the Pittsburgh Steelers.

item.title: Mariners Will Retire No. 51, Again, This Time For Hall of Famer Randy Johnson
item.description: The Seattle Mariners say Hall of Fame left-hander Randy Johnson's No. 51 will be retired during a pregame ceremony next season.

item.title: LSU formally acts to fire Kelly in response to suit
item.description: The LSU board of supervisors authorized new university president Wade Rousse to send former Tigers football coach Brian Kelly a formal notice of termi...

item.title: South Korean 3B Song posted after 26-HR season
item.description: South Korean infielder Sung-mun Song is entering MLB's posting system and will be available for teams to sign through Dec. 21.

item.title: Clarity or more chaos? Breaking down the key games of Week 13
item.description: A Big Ten showdown in the West, playoff hopefuls trying hang on and the potential to clear things up in the ACC.

item.title: Sources: Liberty tab Warriors' DeMarco as coach
item.description: The Liberty have agreed to a deal to hire Chris DeMarco, who has been with the Warriors since 2012, as their new coach, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Pete Alonso's three most aggressive suitors so far -- and a few other fits for the free agent first baseman
item.description: For a second straight winter, the Mets' franchise home run king is seeking a long-term deal. Where might he land?
